name: Lambler Escape
description:
This game introduces you to the world of a wide spread Disease where you’re the only hope to make it stop from spreading!  

This four level game allows you to fight enemies, score points by picking up objects and listen to what the information person is warming you about.  As you progress through the maps the enemies get stronger and more scores are possible, enjoy the View while you’re at it!

This game have been developed for my final software project in my final degree year at a University, any comments about the game are Welcome as it would be of an advantage to develop/ fix anything upon it.
